text: yisakale sarau-suraa dosa-trautira bahirae danara danara papa arau aslila karyakalapara paraa birata thake. Niscaya tomara pratipalakara ksama aparaisima; te'om tomalokara bisaye samyaka aragataâ€”(smarana karaa) yetiya te'om tomalokaka matira paraa srsti karaichila arau yetiya tomaloka matrgarbhata bhraunaraupe achila. Eteke tomaloke atmaprasansa nakaraiba, kone takbaraa aralambana karaiche se'i bisaye teraemi samyaka aragata
